sentences.simplifiedText: 这次会议中出现了一些冲突。
sentences.traditionalText: 這次會議中出現了一些衝突。
sentences.pinyin: zhè cì huì yì zhōng chū xiàn le yī xiē chōng tū.
sentences.translation: There were some conflicts in the meeting.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于资源的分配不均，公司内部产生了严重的冲突。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於資源的分配不均，公司內部產生了嚴重的衝突。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú zī yuán de fēn pèi bù jūn, gōng sī nèi bù chǎn shēng le yán zhòng de chōng tū.
sentences.translation: Due to the uneven distribution of resources, serious conflicts arose within the company.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于利益的冲突，两个公司之间发生了激烈的竞争。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於利益的衝突，兩個公司之間發生了激烈的競爭。
sentences.pinyin: Yóu yú lìyì de chōngtū, liǎng gè gōngsī zhī jiān fāshēng le jīliè de jìngzhēng.
sentences.translation: Due to the clash of interests, there was fierce competition between the two companies.
I want to avoid any contention.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在队伍中，我们应始终避免内部冲突以保持和谐。
sentences.traditionalText: 在隊伍中，我們應始終避免內部衝突以保持和諧。
sentences.pinyin: zài duìwǔ zhōng，wǒmen yīng shǐzhōng bìmiǎn nèibù chōngtū yǐ bǎochí héxié.
sentences.translation: In a team, we should always avoid internal contention to maintain harmony.
